FuncDef: The display arp rate-limit interface command displays the ARP packet rate limit of an interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of the interface on which ARP packet rate limit is configured.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
This command displays the ARP packet rate limit of an interface configured by running the arp rate-limit command.
This command is not applicable to Layer 2 Ethernet interfaces, flexible access interfaces, QinQ stacking interfaces, or QinQ mapping interfaces, or EVC sub-interfaces.
